website_summaries.verdict: Logitech's new V550 Nano laptop mouse adds a unique "clip and go" dock that lets you clip the mouse to your laptop's lid, but we're not sure it's a feature anyone has been clamoring for.
cons: Bland design, no thumb buttons, mouse doesn't snap onto docking button securely enough

customer_reviews.title: why no new product?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mouse 5 years ago and it still works. It is precise and sensitive. In particular, it has a clip-and-go button that I liked the most. I want to purchase a new one, but the price becomes 8 times more. It seems stopped providing new product. I just wander why there is no other manufactory who products similar clip-and-go mouse. Is it due to patent limit? If so, at least Logitech should reproduce it. It is a huge commercial opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for all!
customer_reviews.text: I bring my laptop to and from school everyday, which is also my primary computer at home. Didn't think I'd be crazy about this, but it's got all the features I wanted. Was able to configure left and right wheel tilt to Ubuntu 8.04 with btnx. Clip feature is cool because you can conserve power when you step away and works if you need to move your laptop to another room. Range on mouse is amazing. Wheel scroll is very useful. Middle mouse button need getting used to. I don't know of any smaller receiver, so set it and forget it. Great replacement for my MX510.
customer_reviews.author: Bob vila

customer_reviews.title: The docking feature makes this mouse stand out
customer_reviews.text: There are so many good mouses (mice?) from Logitech, I have a few other models as well, all work great but.. this one is special! I saw my coworker use this mouse, and how useful the docking feature was when going from one meeting room to another with all the items you have to carry. I just had to buy it.. and I really love it. You simply dock it to laptop.. one less item to carry. So cool! It works great too! The scroll wheel is fantastic.. you give it a whip when you have to scroll a lot of pages.. and you're there quicker.. its so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pulipati

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable mouse
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mouse a year ago to use at home and really like it. Made sure to get it at work as well. It is perfect for a laptop, with the adhesive "hanger" that makes it easier to carry around and also turns off the mouse to save batteries. The mouse also has a power on/off button and you can store the USB transmitter on a slot between the batteries for even better portability. The construction is good, the size is not too small and with batteries installed it feels pretty substantial. Overall a good portable mouse.
customer_reviews.author: A user

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this mouse!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouse so much I bought a second one! It works on every surface...even carpet. That is fantastic for someone like me who uses a laptop all over the house! I also love the clip that it comes with. I attached the clip to my netbook, and then hook the mouse to the clip. I carry my computer all over the house and up several flights of stairs, so not having to carry the mouse separately is excellent. Plus the power on the mouse shuts off when you dock it on the clip, so it saves the battery life. I have nothing bad to say about this mouse. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppers McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouse I've Bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mouse I have ever bought. The reasons for my positivity are as follows: 1 - Very responsive 2 - Signal does not drop out like blue-tooth mice 3 - Expose button works great 4 - The scroll wheel has two modes. It rolls clicking slowly and if you press the wheel down it can be flicked to scroll fast. 5 - the scroll wheel also scrolls side to side. 6 - the mouse feels solid and slides on the mouse pads very well
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: - love the small receiver
customer_reviews.text: - love the small receiver; keep it plugged into my laptop full time - battery seems to last long, change maybe every 3-4 months - able to use on many different surfaces - still going strong even after 7 years
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mouse. Had it for several years! The little tab for attaching it to the computer was very useful!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Using with Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I have had several other logitech wireless mouses and this by far is the cadillac of the lot. It reacts smoothly and quickly. The roller ball works well also. The USB receiver is minuscule in size so you don't have to worry about breaking it (as I did with the longer receiver for a V220. I didn't even have to load any software with the OSX software. Just plugged it in and it was up and rolling. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd U

customer_reviews.title: Best USB mouse I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Now granted I haven't tried many of the top of the line USB mouses, but this one has met and exceeded all my expectations. It syncs quickly and consistently and the small size of the USB plug allows me to keep it plugged into my Macbook Pro at all times. Battery life has been excellent, though I don't use the mouse very frequently. Didn't bother with the mount that comes with it, I just throw the mouse in the laptop bag and go.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hussey

customer_reviews.title: V550 and Snow Leopard
customer_reviews.text: I have the Microsoft Wireless Notebook Laser Mouse 6000 which works fine with Windows, but sluggish on Mac (MacBook Pro with Snow Leopard, latest driver doesn't help). Saw the rebate of this Logitech V550 and decided to get one. It works great out of the box, and the additional software enables the application-switching button, more useful than the magnification feature on the Microsoft mouse. Plus, the color matches the MacBook Pro perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: Completly Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: I use it most of the time with my macbook and it works great. It's very confortable, easy to use, when i move i just place it on the dock and move with confidence to any place. I downloaded a program to configure the buttons functions and also u can see the battery status. I really recomend it. Note: I use it in windows XP and Vista at my desktop and a friends laptop and works great too.. Good for gaming and the button down the wheel it's easier to use than pressing the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Cajaledu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: Simple, elegant. Hyper-fast scrolling is AWESOME. I don't know why more people haven't caught on, maybe it's because I'm a coder and I spend all day in long pages of text. V550 silver looks beautiful alongside my MacBook. I've never had a tracking problem at short range, and I use it regularly at distances up to 20 feet. It draws very little power, so the batteries last for several months of daily use. It's a no-nonsense design with no extra buttons or ergonomics, but when it comes to mice, I'm a "soap-bar" kinda guy. Love it--No frills, just beautiful styling and solid performance. Apparently, Logitech no longer produces any models like this--sad.
customer_reviews.author: Brodie

customer_reviews.title: Nice scroll wheel but middle button is difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my laptop running Debian linux, not realizing the price of fast scroll wheel is a separate middle button. The mouse is really easy to use, and the scroll could be really fast and comfortable. No driver needed for linux either. But I'm still not comfortable with the separate middle button: the tiny block near the scroll wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Bin Guo

customer_reviews.title: good mouse with awkward middle button
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mouse for general use. It is working great for last 1 month on most of the surfaces that I have tried. The only problem that I have is with middle button use. For office work, I need to work on Linux environment and I am accustomed to middle button as quick paste button (pressing scroll button for pasting) but in this mouse scroll button press can not be used as a paste button and I need to use separate middle button which is bit awkward. My wife loves it because she only browse internet for which this mouse is a perfect companion. The other positive point is its very small receiver.
customer_reviews.author: rajeevthegreat

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wireless mouse with the smallest USB doo-dad antenna, the V550 Nano fit the bill and has been working great. I love the configurable wheel, the little sticker/knob that I put on my laptop to carry the mouse around, and the comfortable feel of the mouse. When you hang the mouse on the knob, the mouse powers down to save the batteries, nice!
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: i like this mouse alot! i got it for my new lenovo g550 laptop, and i didnt think the adehesive on the little nub would stick to its textured surface, but ive had it for about a month and its still holding strong. its is very comfortable, and works on every surface i have tried it on, including a very fluffy rug. the only con i have found is that the rapid scroll wheel will get pushed in sometimes and it takes some manipulation to get it to scroll smoothly again. other than that, i am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AJGrabenstein

customer_reviews.title: Cordless Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mouse for any system but I use both of mine on laptops. It is so easy to attach to the top of the laptop. You never lose it and it turns off when attached. I bought my first one about 1 year ago. Looked around a couple stores for one like it but no luck there so went on line and bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: DiLee

customer_reviews.title: logitech v550
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product! I am a field service technician and use my laptop all the time at different customer sites. I am constantly packing and unpacking the computer. Two really great things. The mouse works EVERYWHERE. The mouse travels well. Bonus is when I pack to leave, I clip it onto the laptop and I don't forget it at the account! I was considering a blue-tooth mouse, but my laptop would need an upgrade for blue-tooth. The mini-usb connector on the v550 is so small it does not interfer with anything. The 3 year warrantly is a big plus also.
customer_reviews.author: James P

customer_reviews.title: very travel friendly mouse
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these mice due to their features. one for home laptop so mouse neither has a cord, nor gets lost. Also bought one for work laptop which is great when working in airports and gates change. it is easy to attach to the laptop and move to the new gate. I keep one on hand as a spare. Absolutely love this mouse!
customer_reviews.author: Connie V

customer_reviews.title: Logitech V550 LASER MOUSE
customer_reviews.text: Have 3 of them. All work fine with my imacs and Dell laptop computers. Not too small and not too big and has a nice solid feel without being heavy. Women would have no problem with this mouse. Just feels real nice in your hand. Simple design and long battery life. Made for lefties and righties.
customer_reviews.author: KEN TELLS ALL

customer_reviews.title: Mouse that works
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am hard on a mouse, they haven't lasted more than a couple of months before they don't work. This mouse seems destined to break my mouse tradition. It works and has kept working. Be aware, this if a full sized mouse, not really the thing for a notebook or small work areas. Recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mouse to replace the mouse that came with my Apple computer. I found it easy to install and has increased my speed in using the computer. Since I do my main work on the computer it has greatly increased my efficiency. It is described as being for notebooks but I use it on my Apple computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I love this little baby
customer_reviews.text: I just love this mouse. It works perfect. I bought it when it was almost the only one with so tiny insert to my notebook which is so comfortable. I still use the mouse, works great. The mouse is pretty small but very comfortable for my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Logitech V550 Nano Cordless Laser Mouse for Notebooks
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mouse! It's comfortable to use and very responsive. I've only been using it for a couple of weeks, and just recently brought it to my job to use because the wireless mouse I was using there went through batteries every 4 weeks or so! It was getting pricey having to buy batteries every month! I'm not sure how the battery life is with the V550 Nano, but so far it's goin' strong. Anyway, I definitely think it's a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie H.

customer_reviews.title: Heads turn around
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest product I bought so far. It's an example of how some simple innovations can make your life easier. This little guys fits perfectly on my laptop and I never experienced a fall off or something. The holder is very rigid and it fits perfectly for the mouse. People always have "wowwww"... "That's a cool idea..."...."See them mouse..."..."How its hanging in on there"....kind of expressions every time they saw the mouse on my laptop...Buy it you wont regret...
customer_reviews.author: Saran

customer_reviews.title: Great and innovative
customer_reviews.text: This is among the best wireless mouse that I had used. Very easy to install (although the driver and the software needs to be downloaded instead of comes with the product). Operationally, tracking is very precise, the range is more than enough. And everytime I turn on the mouse, it got picked up by the receiver instantaniously. Using the middle button to show all the active windows is very innovative. And finally, the battery last for ever (claimed 180 days. I had been using it for 2 weeks and it is still close to 100% charge)
customer_reviews.author: N. Li

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouse. It's so perfect for my everyday computer/internet life. I bought this item I believe about almost a month ago and I'm very happy I did. The price was cheap and affordable. Although the item description said it's New, I recieved the item as an open-box but it looks totally brandnew. Despite the open package, the mouse looks uber new; no scratches or whatsoever, and accesories inside seems untouched. It also comes with a long-lasting battery. My mouse is still running with the battery that came with it; cool! I'd love to buy similar mouse again if I ever need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: COOL MOUSE
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mouse but it could be much better if: :: is connected via bluetooth... My notebook has just two usb ports... will be better to connect wirelessly!!! :: the wheel is not working as a clicker... you can not click the wheel to open a new tab in browser :((((( :: it is very useful to have the mouse on your screen notebook clipped but it doesnt really look good on my awesome mac! you can not re-use the clipper :( otherwise it is very cool
customer_reviews.author: Crank

customer_reviews.title: Fast, not bulky and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a small and reliable mouse, it is the one. I have a 12" laptop and looking for a not bulky mouse tried first with a Kensington but it died after 4 months, this have the laser accuracy is fastest and stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouse Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for 6 months. It works flawlessly and is extremely fast and accurate. Very comfortable while compact! I purchased Logitech because of past experience. Exceeded expectations. Nice job Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: B. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless mouse.
customer_reviews.text: The wireless mouse is easily portable and performs all normal mouse functions easily and well. The USB plug-connector sticks out from the computer port slightly more than only 1/4 inch and has a secure storage place inside the mouse when being transported. The design is without peer for Netbook or Laptop users. I like it so much I bought a second one for my full-capability laptop and can use the two of them side-by-side without mutual interference. A wonderful plug-and-play product.
customer_reviews.author: Fly.On

customer_reviews.title: It is a dream!!
customer_reviews.text: It is the best mouse that i have ever owned!! Works great but best of all it connects to the front of my laptop so i know where exactly it is at all times when I'm not using it!!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl a thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not white
customer_reviews.text: I think this mouse is wonderful. It responds well, the receiver is way smaller than my previous mouse. The scroll wheel is nice and smooth in hyperfast scrolling mode. However, this mouse is NOT white. It is silver.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mouse for travel to go along with a netbook but found it 33% heavier than a microsoft mouse I bought three years ago. I like the very small USB interface but the mouse itself is too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: 2 years of great use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 2 years. Its great to grab my computer and go. I don't have to put a mouse in my pocket, and I don't have to use a pathetic touch-pad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G. Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Great size and lots of features
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love the small USB transmitter. It's discrete and can be left on the netbook. All I need to do is clip the mouse to its holder and it shuts the battery off automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Francis V

customer_reviews.title: Great for a laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my first laptop since I wasn't used to using a touchpad. Works great, small size fits right in the laptop case or even in your pocket. Great battery life!!
customer_reviews.author: Not Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: nice mouse but buttons die after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: PRO: works on all surface, decent battery life, handy scrolling functions, good price CON: the left and right button die after 2 years, and I dont know how to disassemble to fix it
customer_reviews.author: peter wu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mouse
customer_reviews.text: This mouse works as described and shipping was excellent. The clip on attachment is great as I know where my mouse is at all times now.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Barber

customer_reviews.title: Good Laptop Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I like the Nano technology and the fact that it clips on my computer when I move it. Very good product at a great deal on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CAP

customer_reviews.title: Logitech 550 laser mouse
customer_reviews.text: Great mouse. I gave up on Microsoft for several years now. The shape is the only reason it was dropped to four stars. It is a little too flat for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: ocdan

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse...longest battery life around
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is great and the fact that it clips to the laptop is a bonus. I bought one for a friend, as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tpeak

customer_reviews.title: It worked for less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use the mouse for about a week then the transmitter failed. Maybe I can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless mouse ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mouse for a multitude of reasons: -Wireless and reliable. -Stores on your laptop with a stick-on mount. -Ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: VADER-VOORHEES

customer_reviews.title: Works well with laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cordless laser mouse for your laptop...fits right onto the top with the little button hook...I am happy with it...scrolling is easy...this is tops in my book...( or laptop!)
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, the spinning wheel is a must! Cost X benefit is better than similar ones.
customer_reviews.author: Marco A. de Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Insert & Go
customer_reviews.text: Just plug in the nano into the USB and use it straight away! One of the easiest mouse to use, light and portable. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Teng

customer_reviews.title: Less than expectations
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to have the precision that I expected and saps the battery pretty soon. And doesn't play well with a mac. Should be dumping this for a mac mouse.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murugaiyan

customer_reviews.title: mouse
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 3 yrs now & I love it. The battery life is great. It's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Switchback

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Mobile
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of docking the mouse with the laptop. It makes the mouse very easy to carry around along w/ laptop. The mouse itself is comfortable to hold and sensitive. I only used it for about two weeks, so not sure about the battery life yet. Overall I found my purchase very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Best mouse - mobile or not
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech V550 is a dream to use. The size and weight are perfect. The mouse operates well on many types of surfaces. As advertised the USB radio can remain installed without interfering with the storage of the laptop. The small tab that provides the ability to park the mouse on the laptop is a clever and useful idea. I definitely recommend this mouse for both fixed and mobile operation.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Handy Idea
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, ordered some for my group and then the next thing I knew, we needed more. Word spread on how handy it was to have the mouse right there at your fingertips without feal of loosing it. Really smart!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: After 2 years still works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cordless laser mouse for over 2 years and it works great. No issues of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Mikencol

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This type of mouse is as good as the description! The only weak point is the rolling key has some matters, which is caused by the design. I would like to recommend this item to my friends. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Yangcheng

customer_reviews.title: Cordless Mouse - Works great !
customer_reviews.text: Using the mouse with a Dell laptop. Worked great right out of the box. Especially liked the very small USB plug-in. No need to remove when traveling. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Henne

customer_reviews.title: Love the docking tab.
customer_reviews.text: The docking tab keeps the mouse right where you put it. No more sliding mouse when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Nanotech V550 Mouse by Logitech
customer_reviews.text: I love the small USB connector and the fact the the mouse clips to the laptop case. The mouse performs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie M

customer_reviews.title: Clip on
customer_reviews.text: the clip on is a must! doctors and nurses use this item because they like the fact that they can clip it on the back of their laptops without worrying of losing it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Manueles

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Now Wants One Too
customer_reviews.text: I love the mouse. It works on most surfaces, even my leg, so I can use my laptop everywhere. The clip to the top of the laptop is very convenient and everyone who sees it says they not want one too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I was so very pleased with the purchase process. The shipping was extremely fast. The product was more than I could ever hoped for. For anyone thinking about buying the Logitech V550 do not hesitate. It is more than worth the price. Not to mention buying through Amazon was a easy fast way to purchase the product
customer_reviews.author: janet jordan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mouse for Laptop - or any pc
customer_reviews.text: It's working weel - had it on 3 business trips so far...has worked as expected....would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Product  and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I would buy it again, good choice. I just wish if it has forwored and back button. go for it you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad Almasri

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: Been using this mouse for about 3 months and so far it works great. Easy to use and comfortable. i also like the clip on attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Zherrina

customer_reviews.title: It's using 2 AA batteries a week
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Logitech faithful customer. I bought this mouse to replace another Logitech on my daughter's computer just because this one has a very tiny USB connector that does not sticks out the USB port (teenagers use laptops on their laps and USB could get damaged). Design: A+ Size: A+ (not for big hands on my opinion) USB Connector: A+ Battery life: D- For some reason the mouse is eating batteries, 2AA batteries a week. I still recommend the product, I will be contacting Logitech for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Odanira M. Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Great nano mouse
customer_reviews.text: great mouse , , handling and response . . would like to be a little smaller for use with notebook
customer_reviews.author: Bill37

customer_reviews.title: I do not like its shape
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Amazon, good price and new feature to attach the mouse to the laptop, however, the shape of this mouse make it unusable for me. I am so used to the shapes like VX, V220, or HP or MS, so I can't not get used to this one and it force my arm to raise up and feel tired.
customer_reviews.author: David Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I knew what it was before Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my first laptop, but my brother has a Logitech just like this and I saw how he carried his mouse around and then when my desktop computer of less than one year refused to turn on I got a laptop and a slightly cuter mouse! Not only that but I haven't had to change the batteries yet!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie T

product_meta.title: Logitech V550 Cordless Laser Mouse for Notebooks
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver/GrayLogitech V550 cordless laser mouse for notebooks, with a Clip-and-Go dock that lets you attach your mouse to your laptop, gives you one less thing to carry. The nano receiver is so small, it can stay in your laptop all the time, and advanced power management gives you up to 18 months of battery life.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 

Now You Have One Less Thing to Carry
When you need to grab your laptop and take it to another room or into a meeting, just slide your V550 Nano onto its dock and go. The Clip-and-Go dock makes it easy to attach your mouse to your laptop, and because the wireless nano-receiver is so small, you can leave it plugged into your laptop all the time. With the V550 Nano, you can keep one hand free to grab that all-important cup of coffee.  Key Features 

 

Clip-and-Go Dock That Lets You Snap Your Mouse Onto Your Laptop
Now you have one less thing to carry around your home or office. The Clip-and-Go dock attaches easily to your laptop, so when you're ready to move, just clip your mouse onto the dock and go. And the mouse turns off automatically when attached, helping save battery life.  

Extra-Long Battery Life (Up to 18 Months) and Low-Battery Indicator
Advanced battery management technologies mean that batteries will last up to 18 months. That's a year and a half before you need to change batteries. And the convenient LED battery level indicator notifies you when batteries are low.  

Plug-and-Forget Nano-Receiver That's So Small, It Stays in Your Laptop 
The wireless nano-receiver is small enough to stay in your laptop and even when you pack your laptop away--so it's easy to just plug the receiver in and forget about it.  

Hyper-Fast Scrolling for Flying through Documents and Web Pages
The hyper-fast scroll wheel lets you fly through documents and Web pages in just seconds. One spin and you'll never go back to an ordinary scroll wheel.  

Advanced 2.4 GHz Cordless Technology for More Robust, Reliable Performance
Logitech's new 2.4 GHz cordless wireless technology gives you more robust, more reliable performance than previous-generation technologies and with virtually no delays or drop-outs.  

Superior Laser Precision for Smoother Tracking on Virtually Any Surface
Logitech's advanced laser technology works smoothly and effortlessly on virtually any surface, giving you a level of control many times more precise than an optical mouse.  What's in the Box 

 Package Contents 

 *  Logitech V550 Nano Cordless Laser Mouse for Notebooks 
 * 2.4 GHz Plug-and-Forget Nano-Receive 
 * Two Clip-and-Go docks (silver and black) 
 * Two AA alkaline batteries 
 * Desktop USB extension stand 
 * Clip-and-Go dock storage box 
 * Two cleaning wipes 
 * Clip-and-Go dock removal tool 
 * Quick-Start Guide 
 * Three-year limited hardware warranty 
 * Full product support 

 System Requirements


 * PC with Windows XP, Windows Vista or Macintosh computer with Mac OS X (10.3.9 or above) 
 * 1 available USB port
feature_bullets: One less thing to carry Clip-and-Go dock that lets you snap your mouse onto your laptop
Extra-long battery life (up to 18 months) and low-battery indicator
Plug-and-forget nano receiver that is so small, it stays in your laptop
Revolutionary hyper-fast scrolling for flying through documents and Web pages
Enhanced 2.4 GHz cordless technology for more robust, reliable performance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars145 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
